item.title: Master Goldsmith (Level 8)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 7)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 11)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Looked for change that introduce or remove a string with git log -S

item.title: Master Seamstress (Level 8)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Locksmith (Level 5)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Apprentice Web Designer (Level 1)
item.description: Instantly browse your working repository in gitweb with git instaweb

item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.

item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.title: Master Traveler (Level 7)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Master Architect (Level 8)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Thug (Level 5)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Archivist (Level 5)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 8)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Master Collector (Level 10)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 5)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Merchant (Level 5)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.
